name: Aviation Academy Flying Mission
about: Aviation Academy Flying Mission is the only Approved Training Organisation (ATO) in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering in Botswana. Located in Gaborone, we provide specialized training in aircraft maintenance, ensuring students gain comprehensive skills and knowledge. Our program is designed to meet the highest industry standards, preparing graduates for successful careers in aviation maintenance. With a focus on practical training and theoretical education, we equip students with the expertise needed to excel in this dynamic field. Our dedicated team and state-of-the-art facilities ensure a quality learning experience, making us a leading institution in aviation training in the region. We are committed to producing highly skilled professionals who contribute to the growth and safety of the aviation industry.
services: ["Aircraft Maintenance\nAircraft Maintenance Practices Aircraft Systems and Helicopters\nAircraft Avionics"]
